com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz

Class SettingsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.GeneralMenuActivity
      • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.SettingsActivity

  • public class SettingsActivity
extends GeneralMenuActivity
    In any application we have users with a particular set of preferences. Some may like certain aspects of the application to be in a particular format- others may prefer others in yet some other configuration. This Activity is purely based around the fact that users should be enabled and given the power of choice- to be able to choose what sort of settings they want to have when they utilize our application.
